Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Lycocitin 2 (natural AMPs; spiders, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXA; Lycocitin 3, activity not tested; UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: venom glands, the wolf spider, Lycosa singoriensis

Literature Information.Literature: Lycocitin 2 differs from lycocitin 1 only by one residue, Lys2 in lycocitin 1 but Arg2 in lycocitin 2. Lycocitin 3 shares the amino acid sequence with lycotoxin II with a deletion of Gly26.
Literature Information.Author: Budnik BA, Olsen JV, Egorov TA, Anisimova VE, Galkina TG, Musolyamov AK, Grishin EV, Zubarev RA2004
Literature Information.Title: De novo sequencing of antimicrobial peptides isolated from the venom glands of the wolf spider Lycosa singoriensis
